body_html:
Yes, it's unfortunate that the Win32 LoadLibrary() call doesn't produce a better error message! I've been mentioning this on some other issue threads, but I uploaded a script that can help to check common installation issues for TensorFlow on Windows. You can get it here:

https://gist.github.com/mrry/ee5dbcfdd045fa48a27d56664411d41c

body:
Yes, it's unfortunate that the Win32 `LoadLibrary()` call doesn't produce a better error message! I've been mentioning this on some other issue threads, but I uploaded a script that can help to check common installation issues for TensorFlow on Windows. You can get it here:

https://gist.github.com/mrry/ee5dbcfdd045fa48a27d56664411d41c
